Name: Sergeant Pixel
Description: Sergeant Pixel is a distinguished member of the WebtrES club, known for his unwavering service and dedication to the digital defense force. With a classic screen that always displays his readiness to tackle any mission, he stands tall with his arms steadfastly by his sides. His soldier buttons represent his commitment to order and precision, and the sturdy helmet atop his box is a testament to the countless virtual campaigns he has led. Though his expressions may not change, the camaraderie he shares with his fellow digital comrades is as strong as the toughest code.
